name: The Floor is Lava 3D - Pro
description:
Version without ads
Select your character and have him save himself from the lava on the floor, jumping on furniture and go as far as you can, beat records and challenge your friends.
You have to run because the floor is lava, play the challenge of your favorite youtubers and escape the lava because a volcano has exploded and now the whole ground is lava. A zigzag maze game for kids. Fun skill game in zig zag or labyrinth in which you have to touch the screen to change the direction of our character. Stay on the road and do as many zigzags as you can. Try not to fall off the edges! Do not forget that your character runs faster and faster!
Keep running to stay on the 3D route! Collect all drinks, increase your score and run fast. Go as far as you can! Zig Zag is a torsion game that will test your reaction speed and reflex abilities. Do each course quickly to make sure you do not fall!
If you like our application, please rate and comment to help us improve!
